verses.roman:
haridāsa kahena,--kene karaha saṁśaya?
śāstre kahe,--nāmābhāsa-mātre 'mukti' haya

synonyms: haridāsa kahena—Haridāsa Ṭhākura said; kene—why; karaha saṁśaya—are you doubtful; śāstre kahe—it is stated in the revealed scriptures; nāma-ābhāsa mātre—simply by a glimpse of the chanting of the holy name; mukti haya—there is liberation.
translation: Haridāsa Ṭhākura said, "Why are you doubtful? The revealed scriptures say that one can attain liberation simply by a glimpse of offenseless chanting of the holy name.
